amendment.description: Amendment sought to exempt States from right-to-carry reciprocity when the State does not require individuals to apply for and complete a carry permit application at their local law enforcement station.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 112-283 to exempt states from issuing a carry permit on the basis of state reciprocity which do not require individuals to apply for and complete a carry permit application at their local law enforcement station.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hastings (FL) amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 148 - 277 (Roll no. 845).
